title: Twisted Arrangement 2
description: Emma was never going to see Josh again. That was the plan. She’d used her talent for disguises and her feminine wiles to gain access to his bedroom, stolen back her family’s heirloom watch, and left him with a full bottle of champagne and an empty bed.That was supposed to be the end of it. But when Josh hires Picture Perfect for another event, she comes face-to-face with the gorgeous Hollywood producer again. With the memory of his scorching kisses still fresh on her lips, Emma has to do her job and protect her secret from Josh’s determined investigations. He’s intent on tracking down the sexy mystery woman who robbed him. What will he do if he finds out she’s been right under his nose this whole time?***The sparks fly in this second installment of ‘Twisted Arrangement’, a contemporary romance full of crazy schemes, geek humor, and just the right amount of spice!
author: Mora Early
